Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor/Nemesis Enforcer:



Serpentor heard Dinobot, sidestepping, leapt into the air, boosters rocketing 
him off into the sky, catching a blast in his side, firing an optic blast at 
Dinobot.

---

Koga Shuko saw Dinobot attacking Serpentor.  Raising his missile launcher, he 
fired a rocket off at Dinobot.

---

Anubis fired three plasma blasts off at Dinobot from his rifle.

---

Hades raised his launcher, firing a rocket off at the Ark.

---

Nemesis heard Dinobot growling while engaging Serpentor.  Getting up, he saw 
Dinobot approaching him, raising his rifle, he caught the brunt of the blast 
in his armored chest plate.  Steping back a few feet from the power of the 
blast, he pulled the trigger, a dozen rapid laser bolts lancing out at 
Dinobot's lower torso.
